data.eml:eml: Litarcturus kexueiae sp. nov., a new deep-sea isopod from the Okinawa Trough (Crustacea, Isopoda, Valvifera, Antarcturidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Wenliang, Sha, Zhongli (2015): Litarcturus kexueiae sp. nov., a new deep-sea isopod from the Okinawa Trough (Crustacea, Isopoda, Valvifera, Antarcturidae). Zootaxa 4013 (4): 531-540, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4013.4.4
